trigger.title: Trigger: Any Block Use
trigger.description: Triggers under the same conditions as both minecraft:default_block_use and minecraft:item_used_on_block.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

location.title: Location
location.description: Specifies a list of predicates that must pass in order for the criterion to be granted. The origin is the location of the block that was interacted with, the block state belongs to that block, and the tool is either the item used on the block (for the item_used_on_block case) or simply the item in the player's main hand (for the default_block_use case). The this entity is the player that would get the advancement.
